name: The legend of Rounds and Sharps
name_original: The legend of Rounds and Sharps
description:
An experimental game, in two parts: part 1 is the tutorial and past 2 is where you get to build infinite levels t have fun with. Your progress is saved into a binary encrypted file, so you can return later and continue your adventure!

Your donation is much appreciated https://www.paypal.com/paypalme/FlorinPain

Join the family, show me your games and get in touch with me https://www.instagram.com/florinpain_official/?hl=en-gb
